text: Ellezine ye’kuluner riba la yekumune illa kema yekumullezi yetehabbetuhus seytanu minel mess(messi), zalike bi ennehum kalu innemal bey’u mislur riba, ve ehallallahul bey’a ve harramer riba fe men caehu mev’izatun min rabbihi fenteha fe lehu ma selef(selefe), ve emruhu ilallah(ilallahi), ve men ade fe ulaike ashabun nar(nari), hum fiha halidun(halidune)
